items.content_html: imgbb-image-uploader is a lightweight Node.js library for uploading images to the ImgBB API. It provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for uploading images and retrieving their URLs.

items.content_html: Vans Router is a lightweight and flexible router for building single-page applications (SPAs) using JavaScript. It provides a simple and intuitive API for defining routes, handling navigation events, and updating the view based on the current route.

items.content_html: ShareIt is a lightweight, cross-platform file sharing tool that facilitates quick and easy file transfers between devices on the same network. By compressing files into a single .zip archive and serving them via an HTTP server, ShareIt streamlines the process of sharing files in a terminal-friendly manner.
items.title: moein9gh/shareit: ShareIt is a lightweight, cross-platform file sharing tool that facilitates quick and easy file transfers between devices on the same network. By compressing files into a single .zip archive and serving them via an HTTP server, ShareIt streamlines the process of sharing files in a terminal-friendly manner.
